author: Victoria Friedman, Victoria Friedman
title: More than Half a Million Britons Join NHS Volunteer Coronavirus Corps
description: 560,000 Britons have volunteered to support the National Health Service (NHS) in taking care of the country's vulnerable citizens during the coronavirus pandemic, more than double the initial government call for 250,000.
content:
560,000 Britons have volunteered to support the National Health Service (NHS) in taking care of the country’s vulnerable citizens during the coronavirus pandemic, more than double the initial government call for 250,000.
